Uses of Class
com.wotifgroup.zkfss.ZKFeatureSwitchService

    • Uses of ZKFeatureSwitchService in com.wotifgroup.zkfss

      Methods in com.wotifgroup.zkfss that return ZKFeatureSwitchService 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ZKFeatureSwitchService ZKFeatureSwitchService.disableHostnameSubKey()
      Disables the hostname sub-key override capability.
      ZKFeatureSwitchService ZKFeatureSwitchService.enableHostnameSubKey()
      Allows the feature switch name to be overridden by a sub-key based on the hostname.
      ZKFeatureSwitchService ZKFeatureSwitchService.setApplicationName(String applicationName)
      Set the application name to use as a sub-key for a potential feature switch value override.
      ZKFeatureSwitchService ZKFeatureSwitchService.setConnectionTimeoutMillis(int connectionTimeoutMillis)
      Set the zookeeper connection timeout (in millis) to use in the CuratorFramework.
      ZKFeatureSwitchService ZKFeatureSwitchService.setConnectString(String connectString)
      Set the zookeeper connection string to use in the CuratorFramework.
      ZKFeatureSwitchService ZKFeatureSwitchService.setCuratorFrameworkClient(com.netflix.curator.framework.CuratorFramework client)
      Set a CuratorFramework for the system.
      ZKFeatureSwitchService ZKFeatureSwitchService.setCuratorFrameworkConnectionRetryPolicy(com.netflix.curator.RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Set the connection retry policy for the CuratorFramework.
      ZKFeatureSwitchService ZKFeatureSwitchService.setFeatureSwitchNamespace(String featureSwitchNamespace)
      Set the namespace to use for feature switches.
      ZKFeatureSwitchService ZKFeatureSwitchService.start()
      Start this service.
